entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Blowing snow this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 8:18 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:18 PM CST Wednesday 19 April 2023
